website_summaries.verdict: This unisex hair regrowth shampoo contains natural extracts and oils to stimulate growth.
pros: Designed to revitalize, strengthen, and volumize hair
Includes biotin and keratin to prevent breakage and hair loss.Designed for all hair types

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: First off, it smells great! It's definitely thickening my hair as well as promoting hair growth where I've never been able to grow more than baby hairs. I took someone else's advice and bought a biotin vitamin to take daily as well. I feel like my hair has never felt healthier! I highly recommend! The pictures are the left and right sides of my head where I've never had much hair growth. The bottom was about 3-4 weeks after I started using the shampoo and taking biotin.
customer_reviews.author: laura peddell

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I no longer have a handful of hair in the drain or in my hands after shampooing. The texture is fuller, and I do see hair starting to regrow and po up all over my head. I have long hair, and it looks so much better now that I am using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela M.

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo feels good - that's the good part
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo feels good - that's the good part. My husband and i used one bottle, and it's too early to tell the effect on hair growth. Today, i took another look at the ingredients, and found, yikes, it contains certain moderate to high risk ingredients, such as DMDM HYDANTOIN. It's a human irritant and releases formaldehyde, a known human carcinogen. i hope they get rid of such ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: celia mou

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo smells really great! It made my hair feel really soft and clean. I got this to see if it helps with my hair breakage. So far my hair is looking great. It didn’t weigh my hair down at all, and my scalp feels very clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Despain

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It has a beautiful, essential oil quality lemon grass scent. I’m not sure how much it works in regards to helping with hair loss, but it smells fabulous and my natural Italian fine curls look great.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works great power give it the shot with this product
customer_reviews.text: Works great power give it the shot with this product. It contains peppermint oil that cools and tingle the scalp, and causes it to stimulate and also has a lot of good natural oil‘s and vitamins that are good for your hair
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: After two months this stuff made my hair fall out ...
customer_reviews.text: After two months this stuff made my hair fall out and broke pieces of my hair off. I will never buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looove it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for two weeks or so but I really like it so far. It makes my scalp tingle – I really feel like it’s working. My hair does look a little thicker but I think it’s too soon to tell. Edit 2 years later: So it did work, I do like it but I felt like it was too expensive for the amount of product I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chantillace019

customer_reviews.title: Good for coarse hair
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this just to use around my edges. Years of extensions has made them so thin!! This stuff feels great and leaves my hair clean without stripping the oils (which is a deal breaker for me). I’m surprised It actually also helped de tangle my hair too. (I have very thick 4c hair)For the price it’s definatley worth to keep this in my hair care regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Duncan

customer_reviews.title: False claims/nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the 5-star reviews, I'm convinced 99% of them are all shills. This made my hair extremely limp and fall out more. Some of the "ingredients" in here sound shady and hyped up. Stick to eating a nutritionally-dense diet with real vitamins and do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: doomvegan

customer_reviews.title: This did absolutely nothing even after using it every single ...
customer_reviews.text: This did absolutely nothing even after using it every single day. I am a female with PCOS which entails high DHEA levels on the surface of the scalp which inhibits hair loss but this did not happen.
customer_reviews.author: Cranjis McBasketball

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend using this product
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return item, passes window. The product had no noticeable affect on me, no new hair growth or healthier looking existing hairs. I don't recommend using this product.
customer_reviews.author: larry stevens

customer_reviews.title: First use, works amazing and not greasy !
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this item and thought there’s no way that this product barely has any bad reviews but I still decided to try it. The smell isn’t that serious people are exaggerating with how strong or bad it is lol! It lathers slightly and definitely tingles! My hair feels so good today and I’m definitely glad I made this purchase. I bought this item for hair growth but it’s obviously too soon to tell, I will write another review in a month!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strips Hair Color
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad ... this shampoo is loaded with sulphate - the ingredient that strips hair color. In fact different “sulphate” compounds are the first 3 ingredients listed. If you don’t color your hair I think this product may very well do what it says it will do. However, I spend a lot of money every month on my hair color and it’s stripping it big time. I’ve used it every day for two weeks. I just want to alert you.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works! I've been using it for 2 weeks and have noticed a huge improvement in postpartum hair loss and breakage! I will keep ordering as long as they keep selling it. I'm ecstatic I found this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheYibales

customer_reviews.title: More bald spots cause of this product
customer_reviews.text: After using this product my scalp began burning and itching. I ended up losing a ton of hair and now have bald spots on the top of my head which weren't there before.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me - lost more hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had a thinning scalp and thought it would help. It made my condition worse, I lost so much hair even in the shower. I would lose several strands every time I brushed my hair, which never happened with my previous shampoos. Thanks to this shampoo, my scalp looks even worse. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was pretty skeptical but decided to give it a shot. I have tried minoxidil (rogaine) without much success. I bought my first bottle of this shampoo maybe 6 months ago and just ran out today. Ordering a 2nd bottle now! My wife and I definitely noticed my hair looks thicker after about 1 to 2 weeks of daily use. I also am no longer losing hairs every morning when I comb!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend who is worried about hair loss, he has been using it for a little over 2 month. He claims that when he shampoos he sees more hair in his fingers then he used to. So for now he isn’t satisfied but he is going to give it more time.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, makes your hair feel nice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it daily, left it in for 4 mins before washing off. Smells nice, makes your hair feel nice, however hair loss has rate has not changed after full month of use. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Postpartum Hair Loss Helper!!
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from postpartum hair loss after the birth of my little girl. I could no longer wear my hair in a ponytail without a headband because I was too embarrassed of my hairline, which was difficult as I’m a personal trainer. After only 10 days of using the shampoo and conditioner, these were the results! I’m amazed. My husband will be using it after I get a good 2 months in and he can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: DIDN'T work at all for me all it did was leave scars on my forehead
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: DID NOT WORK!!!!! WASTE OF MY MONEY!!!!!! AFTER USING IT AS DIRECTED 2-3 MONTHS STILL NO RESULTS A MATTER OF FACT WE SAW LOSS OF HAIR.... DO NOT RECOMMEND I PURCHASED BECAUSE REVIEWS WERE GREAT BUT NOPE AS A ACTUAL USER OF THE PRODUCT I GIVE 1 STAR ONLY BECAUSE IT ARRIVED UNDAMAGED AS WELL AS ON TIME..
customer_reviews.author: Jesse jay

customer_reviews.title: Worked opposite
customer_reviews.text: This is far from what was described. I got this product On March 22 and gave it 5 weeks. Today is April 29. This shampoo/conditioner combo made my hair even more brittle and dry. The shampoo is so harsh with deep cleaning ingredients that the paired conditioner can’t give enough softness to the hair. Being formal hairstylist, I know you should be able to see new grown baby hair in 4 weeks, plus my hair grow fast, however no difference with this product. Just mega dry. I have half bottle left I am throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Oksana Walker

customer_reviews.title: What a waste!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair shampoo was a waste of money. I used this product as stated with no results. I wish I can get my money back but I never will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As an African American, it did not just work ...
customer_reviews.text: As an African American , it did not just work, in contrary my hairs are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Herve D

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product. I do suffer from hair loss and I am only 30 years old. It's embarrassing. I have tried different shampoos, vitamins and oils. They never seemed to work. I decided to give this a try and after about a month I did see new growth. I finished the entire bottle and after a few weeks of not using it. The new growth I had stopped and disappeared. It's ok as long as you continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Nothing works!
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavy smell like herbs. It gives me a headache. I cannot stand that smell. However I've been using for over six months and still my hairs fall off; I could see hairs on the tile walls and drain. No thickness at all. I am pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: No Change
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like this product at all. Used it as directed and saw no improvement in my hair. Lets not mention the smell...its awful. I am 40 and have thinning hair. Began using this product and still saw hair loss and thinning hair. The bottle does say you may not see results for up to 3 months, but I cant handle 3 months of that smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This did not even enhance hair growth, will not buy again any of these products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No difference than any other shampoo just more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I used it for several months, following the recommendations how to use it, but it didn't work at all, I kept loosing hair.
customer_reviews.author: F.M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not regrow hair..but not a bad shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I used this with rogaine foam and let me tell you...it does not regrow hair. It's a nice shampoo, but does not regrow hair.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible. Reminds me of the lemon dish washing liquid for the 80’s. Definitely not how I would want my hair to smell.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I have used up both shampoo and conditioner. They did nothing to improve my hair condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Chen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is very watery, does not suds at all and did not clean nor help my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried methods for thickening my hair but this is the first product that has worked. I have been using it for 6 weeks and my hair is really getting thicker. My hairdresser showed me the new growth sticking up all over. I am impressed and totally thrilled. I highly recommend that you try this product for thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marfa

customer_reviews.title: Review Legitmacy
customer_reviews.text: It is interesting as another reviewer pointed out that all positives reviews for this product seem to be recent within a couple of month period ??? Sadly there's no way to know the legitmacy anymore and the day of relying on quality reviews to help with making choices seems sketchy :(
customer_reviews.author: Whitney777

customer_reviews.title: Expensive shampoo, zero results
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this for quite some time and we never saw a difference at all in our before and after pictures. Expensive shampoo with zero results.
customer_reviews.author: The Thurman's

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair look and feel pretty darn good.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using both the PureBio Revitalizing shampoo and conditioner for at least 6 months now and I can say that I am a happy customer. The product doesn't necessarily grow your hair back, but I do feel like it is helping me to prevent or slow down my hair loss. I feel like the ingredients in it are much better than most shampoos and conditioners. This stuff is way better than anything I can get at Walgreens or Walmart. I actually use it on my hair and beard. It is definitely worth giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo.  Tried others, and this one seems to work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have used other shampoos here on Amazon, some with Argan Oil claiming to help regrow hair. Those did help, but I found this one to be more affordable. It smells sort of lemony and lathers nicely. It sort of makes my scalp tingle, and I have not had any breaks or fall outs. My hair seems to be more thicker and healthier. I would recommend this product...for now.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I’m using the shampoo and conditioner. I’ve been too nervous to try minoxidil so I gave this a try. First of all it smells amazing! It leaves my hair feeling silky and deep conditioned without being greasy or heavy. My curls look great, bouncy and defined. I’ve noticed a lot less fall out when I brush my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Don't hate it, but don't love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this a month ago. I wash my hair 3 times a week. Haven't seen any changes yet. Don't hate it, but don't love it. If you color your hair, this WILL strip your color. It is NOT sulfate free. I will give it more time and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write reviews for most products however when something ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews for most products however when something works as advertised I have to comment , this shampoo works bottom line , I've used Rogaine for a few years with mixed results , I've been using this shampoo for about 6 weeks now and I see impressive results , my hair is muck thicker and I have gotten compliments about my hair ( 60 years old)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Statti

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It caused my hair to fall out. I am now getting shots from my dermatologist. Do not use this!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Another scam. There is no such thing as a shampoo that stops hair loss . Marketing scam. I used this product for months and nothing changed . Don’t waste your money .
customer_reviews.author: Travis Blick

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: i bought this item because all the good reviews but to be honest i used it for over 3 weeks and didn’t notice any reduction on my hair loss it does smell good and leaves you fresh scent but other than i would not recommend its just an over expensive shampoo
customer_reviews.author: areli g.

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair worse
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this and the conditioner 3 or 4 times hoping it would work,it didnt my hair is thinner and breaking off more, I was going to ask for a refund but the last day was 15th November for one,this might work for some people but it made my hair worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Came quarter full, open top and splattered. But Amazon with it's Amazing customer service refunded my money for me with in 5 mins. Im gonna try out what was left in the bottle and see how i like it. Smells great though
customer_reviews.author: marvin pelt

customer_reviews.title: does not work in any capasity
customer_reviews.text: I have used two bottles of this shampoo over the last 3 months, 5 days a week. No new hair growth at all and the hair I do have seems even finer than before. The product has a very "herbal" smell to it that I did not enjoy. My husband used this product as well and found the same results. Wish it worked, but for the price, I should have just bought shampoo and the grocery store and saved the money. I give it 2 stars because I did like the very natural ingredients used.
customer_reviews.author: Staci G

customer_reviews.title: Full of Body
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting older and for years now my hair has been thinning and seeming so fine. I've tried almost everything out there. A friend recommended this to me so i bought it. So far so good, great citrus smell and leaves my scalp feeling tingley and healthy. The extra body my hair has is a definite plus! Call me crazy, but I also love the pump dispenser!
customer_reviews.author: R.CALIUP

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The product made my scalp extremely itchy and flaky. It also made my hair fall out even more than it was falling before. After almost 2 weeks of usage I stopped and went back to my regular hair shampoo. I week later I tried it again and made my hair itchy and flaky again. This product does not work for me. It was a waste of money. i would give it a -10 if i could.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Try at your risk
customer_reviews.text: My hair was shedding a lot more after use. Bought this a while ago and couldn't write a review. I have fine and thin hair, it didnt work for me but I like the scent
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a little changed after the first bottle but nothing impressive. I don’t think I’ll buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: uneven quality
customer_reviews.text: the first bottle was good and shampoo was white and silky. the second, had a different smell, the shampoo was brownish. not the same product. it does not have a valid date
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the left is before I started using this product, & on the right was just yesterday, about 3 months of usage, & I think it is a great product & recommend it to anyone! It has made my hair healthier, even inbetween coloring, & helped it get some length! Smells great too!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for a small amount of product.
customer_reviews.text: I woundn't of minded the cost if it worked. Been using it for a month and still losing hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melody O

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My hair still falls out. I don’t understand I followed the directions and still I don’t see any changes. The scent is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: I like this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. I've actually gotten comments that my hair shines and looks good. I can't yet vouch for the hair growth effects. What I can say is that I no longer get much hair in my brush and never see it in the drain. It feels like I am at least keeping what I have now. I bought this shampoo on my own after reading reviews of several products. I liked it enough to buy a second bottle. Pure Biology then offered a promotion. I bought two more bottles with the promotion. Thanks Pure Biology
customer_reviews.author: Surfcaster

customer_reviews.title: I have used the product 4+ times and my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used the product 4+ times and my hair continues to fall out. The Manufacture's claims is after 3 uses I will see a difference, which I have not seen at all. I will continue to use the product until I have used the complete bottle, but will purchase again,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reduces hair loss significantly.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use pump. Leaves hair feeling clean. I've been using it for hair loss and my hair isn't coming out like it was before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Van Den Bloomer

customer_reviews.title: no results..
customer_reviews.text: tried shampoo & conditioner.. no results.. hair still very dry and thin..
customer_reviews.author: A I

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and saw results from first use
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is everything!!! My hair is thin, and has many knots after shower, and usually the bathtub is full of my hair .. after just the first wash I was able to comb it easily, less hair in the tub, and when it dried it didn’t puff out like usual. All this to say I LOVE this shampoo. And the smell is amazing, smells therapeutic, like lemon grass. I hope it works for you like it is for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Hanadi Suleman

customer_reviews.title: Not as claimed
customer_reviews.text: Just to be fair to the product, and also with that little hope of mine to improve my hair condition. I used this product continuously for 1 year, bought 5 times. Now I can positively say IT DOES NOT WORK AS CLAIMED. There is no visible improvement of my hair condition, based on my observation as well as my wife's, and on top of that, there is always small particles sticking to my scalp that I can feel them every time I run my fingers through my hairs. After switched back to regular shampoo, that problem has completely disappeared. My recommendation is do not buy, it is worse than the regular shampoo, smells bad and doesn't work as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I have baby hairs!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shampoo and conditioner in early spring and have been using it every few days. It doesn’t get all the oils out of my hair, so I can’t use it daily. It smells really great. I had hair loss due to severe anxiety and depression. Guess what? I’m seeing baby hairs all over! I’m not sure if it was the shampoo and conditioner combo or just getting a bit better mentally, but give the shampoo a try! I’m so happy to see hair regrowth. My hair feels thicker and stronger, too.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good shampoo, don't know if it's actually reducing hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this actually helps my hair grow/reduces hair loss, but I like it as a shampoo. It smells good, I like the way my hair feels after I wash it, and as far as I can tell it isn't harming my hair in any way, so I'll continue to use it. My only complaint would be the small bottle, wish it was bigger, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Green

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: Did not regrow my hair like it claim it did. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bandana

customer_reviews.title: No Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: No regrowth of hair. Made my hair soft and clean, but did not improve its volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair is dry and stiff
customer_reviews.text: It may smell nice, but my hair is so dried out after. I need to buy a conditioner to soften my hair. Will be returning it
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Baron

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. On the contrary i lost more hair. Don't loss your money.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: What a joke. I haven’t noticed any difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. I haven’t noticed any difference in hair growth or breakage but maybe that’s because the bottle is so small that ive only been able to use it for 2 weeks. The back of the bottle says to maintain use for 2-3 MONTHS for results but There’s not even enough to use for ONE month. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: SLA💋

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Used the product for 5 months straight -- almost daily. But no hair growth whatsoever. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nasir Gondal

customer_reviews.title: less hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this product. Have used other hair loss products with no results. Purebiology leaves my hair soft and very clean feeling. Not to mention big improvement in hair loss. A little goes a long way and the scent is light and pleasing. Worth the price. My only concern is they may have changed the formula. My second order of this shampoo has a slightly changed formula and little information as to where it was manufactured. I retured it unopened/unused and reordered the original labeled bottel I first used, Purebiology manufactured by Phoenix Laboratorirs exclusively for Purebiology Orange, Calif.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work and to much $ for a small amount that didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Not worth trying this
customer_reviews.text: Not a worth trying...I used it every day...hair loss was severe and it didn't stop falling...had to stop it to avoid complete hair loss...very bad I fell in this trap
customer_reviews.author: Purna

customer_reviews.title: My hair is falling out
customer_reviews.text: This product is good to make the hair grow fast ,but my hair started to fall later
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: It smells great, and he said it rinses clean
customer_reviews.text: This served it's purpose 100%. My uncle is slowly balding and he's very paranoid about it. I ordered this as a gag gift for Christmas but he's determined to see the bottle through. It smells great, and he said it rinses clean. So can't wait to update this, once the bottle is done.
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe Sanchez Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Its Pricey!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my hair was falling like crazy. Im giving it 2 stars because for the first week it seemed like falling hair had decreased by 50%; however, after that my hair went back to falling again. I finished the entire bottle in hopes that it might eventually work but it did not.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Smell isn't pleasant but isn't horrible, you can out scent it with the conditioner ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping to see results soon. I've been using for about 3-4 weeks now, no increase or decrease in hair growth. Smell isn't pleasant but isn't horrible, you can out scent it with the conditioner you use so don't worry.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help at all, actually seemed to expedite hair loss
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure it helped my hair 2 grow and make it thicker n healthier. I suffer from a reversing hairline on the sides and this kicked my follicles back Into overdrive again and the smell was pleasent.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this product - I was very skeptical about it but I saw it had great reviews so I decided to give it a try and I am not disappointed. I've only been using the shampoo and conditioner for about a week and I've already noticed a huge difference in the amount of hair on my head. It doesn't shed nearly as much as it used to, and it feels much thicker. Obviously it's not a miracle cure and might not work for everyone but it works for me so far...thank you Pure Biology for making a product that actually does what is advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: Junericam

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for a while but then it didn’t do much after that.
customer_reviews.author: AuntiePop

customer_reviews.title: Hair Loss has DIMINISHED since I began using PURE
customer_reviews.text: I began to noticemy hair was thinning and then all. if a sudden my curly licks were STRAIGHT. I went on-line and researched shampoos. PURE had the ingredient Keratin that my hair might respond to. I ordered PURE through Amazon and has soon as the shampoo arrived. I began using. To date I have noticed that I am not losing as much hair as I was 3 weeks ago. I am going to continue using the shampoo along with conditioner. I'm sure my medication and age prompted the unusual behavior of my hair. PURE has to date improved the condition of my hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My hair is actually growing faster and my hair loss is starting to slow down. I highly recommend this product! I am a 49 year old women who started experiencing thinning hair ad breakage due to the fact that I color my hair approximately every 4-6 weeks. Since using this product for about 1 month my hair is much less, my hair is growing faster, and my hair feels thicker. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied to say the least!

customer_reviews.title: It's been just over a year (^_^)
customer_reviews.text: I'm not seeing as much scalp (filling in) since I started using Pure Biology. I'm definitely seeing improved growth / regrowth, but this isn't my only treatment resource. However, I'm confident it is contributing to the results I'm getting. We'll continue to purchase Pure Biology because we like what we're SEEING. Bonus: Pure Biology may have a free bottle offer (look inside the box for a sticker), which was unexpected and greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Passive Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Still using this and the shampoo, but cannot verify whether or not this works for me. Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Toni DeMello

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. This is not a fake review of someone has a question I'll give you an honest answer. I was losing my hair steadily no matter what shampoo I was using. I've been using this for about a month now and I've seen a big decrease in the rate of hair loss. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife because her hair was thinning and falling out because she was so sick for about a year she had to have two procedure's done. It hasn't helped her grow new hair but it has made it much stronger and more vitality to it. You don't need a lot of it to wash your hair with.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: but I wasn't very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I had a very high expectation based on the reviews, but I wasn't very happy with the product. It contains some chemicals, like sulfate, which is not good for colored hair. Also, it is not very cost effective since I needed to use a lot to even create enough foams. I liked the smell, but that was about what I could say. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mikae

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful, didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Natural cures are a roll of the dice, something that works great for 10% of an afflicted population can be a waste for the rest of the people. This “stimulator” did nothing for me. Nice smell and decent shampoo but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hohauser

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair very manageable
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor recommended this shampoo. I've got it and am using it and am very happy with it. Previously I always used a brand of shampoo that helps to keep the color in my hair. I have not used this shampoo long enough to know if my color will quickly fade or stay in tact.
customer_reviews.author: MHK

customer_reviews.title: Fuller, yes? Longer? We will see
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this product for a couple weeks, but my hair is already significantly thicker. However, I mostly bought this to speed up growing the length of my hair out. I haven’t noticed a crazy increase in length, but my hair feels so thick and full I’m actually having a hard time styling it! So if you are dealing with hair loss or weakness I’d highly recommend this. If you are just in it for length I don’t know if this is the fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shampoo made my scalp very dry some shampoo got ...
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo made my scalp very dry some shampoo got on my forehead and made my forehead very dry as well... something isn’t right about this product will be asking for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Rivard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I got this mostly for my husband who is very self conscious about pre-mature hair loss. It doesn’t bother me do I don’t know what he’s worried about, but I guess I see where he’s coming from. He loves this shampoo and so far, his hair loss hasn’t increased and actually seems to have slowed down. I’ve used it as well and my hair felt very clean and refreshed afterwards-although I have super thick hair and don’t actually need it, but I wanted personal experience with it. It felt great on my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Buginchina

customer_reviews.title: Great Thicker Hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of hair products but this is one that I’ve kept coming back for and am on my 4th or 5th bottle now. I personally just love both the smell and feel of it which is always a plus. But of course I came back for more when I realized it was gradually showing some improvement in my hair thickness. I would definitely recommend giving this product a try!
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shampoo that actually works on me! It definitely made my hair grow new ones & it also made my hair stop falling. This is my second time ordering & I love it! I have tried other products but it didn’t seem to work on me so glad to say this will be the one I’ll be sticking with!
customer_reviews.author: Kikabc09

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: At the very first application of the shampoo, I felt ichy on my scalp. And after a few treatments, I stopped losing my hair and hair grew back at the bald spot of my head. My coworkers saw the result and asked me to order the product for them. It worked for me. It may not work for everyone... But I'd recommend this product if you're experiencing hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful and my hair is SO soft!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Breast Cancer a few years ago at age 36. Chemo left my hair VERY thin when it came back in, and I've tried all kinds of products and vitamin since, and so far nothing has worked. I will update in a month and let you know if this has helped or not. :) It does smell very nice. A lemongrass type of smell, and my hair is very soft after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Definitely noticed a halt and burgeoning reversal of post-menopausal hair loss. Product smells good - not flowery - and leaves my hair clean and soft. Don't know why no one has commented on hairy palms.
customer_reviews.author: NX-O1

customer_reviews.title: great scent
customer_reviews.text: I really like the scent of this shampoo. I've had some hair loss post-partum and with a thyroid condition. So far I haven't noticed a huge change but it feels really good and I like the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JMohan

product_meta.title: Pure Biology Hair Growth Stimulating Shampoo with Biotin, Keratin, Natural DHT Blockers, Vitamins B + E & Breakthrough Anti Hair Loss Complex for Thinning, Damaged Hair for Men & Women
product_meta.description:
3HC STIMULATION COMPLEX – This blend of plant-derived ingredients has been clinically shown to stimulate hair growth and hair regrowth by promoting the proliferation of HFDPC cells, the stem cells responsible for regulating hair follicle development, increasing the number of growing fibers, increasing follicle lifespan and preventing hair loss.* In clinical trials of alopecia patients using dermatologist conducted pull tests (clinical method used to estimate amount of hair loss), the analysis showed a reduction in hair loss of 21% over a 3-week period.*

TIME-TESTED BASE SHAMPOO – Vitamin E, Coconut Oil, Rosemary Oil, Green Tea Extract, Vitamin B Panthenol, Biotin and Keratin, this volumizing shampoo cleanses and protects, making a perfect choice for overall hair regrowth, hair repair and hair regrowth for men and women, shampoo for oily hair, straight hair and even curly hair products.*

ANAGEN VS. TELOGEN – 3HC has the unique ability to increase the ratio of anagen (growth phase) to telogen (resting/dying phase) hair, which keeps follicles in a more constant state of growth.* By keeping a larger percentage of hair in the growth phase and preventing hair from entering resting phase, the body will continually encourage hair growth.* After treatment with 3% 3HC a 31% increase in the anagen/telogen ratio was realized in just 60 days.*

THE SCIENCE OF AMINO KERA NPNF – Combination of Keratin-derived amino acids designed for deeper penetration than other Keratin ingredients due to its molecular weight distribution, it has been clinically proven to provide immediate & long-term strengthening.* In lab tests, hair treated with 2% Amino Kera NPNF conditioner showed an immediate 10% increase in strength (defined as total work required to break hair) vs. placebo conditioner and a 41% increase after 3 applications.*
feature_bullets: BEST HAIR GROWTH BLEND – Packed with natural extracts, amino acids, Biotin, Keratin and Rosemary Oil, Vitamins B and E, Saw Palmetto and more, this shampoo features proprietary hair growth complexes clinically indicated to stimulate deep growth and prevent breakage and hair loss.*

BREAKTHROUGH COMPLEXES – Amino Kera NPNF Keratin complex penetrates deep to strengthen and revitalize damaged hair while moisturizing and conditioning.* 3HC stimulates cells responsible for growing fibers and regulating hair follicle development.*

DHT BLOCKER – Saw Palmetto and Green Tea are essential to preventing dihydrotestosterone (DHT) to promote regrowth of natural hair.* Additionally, Rosemary Oil helps treat alopecia and thinning hair.*

STRENGTHEN & RECONSTRUCT – A gentle everyday shampoo designed to volumize, strengthen, thicken and stimulate natural hair regrowth while providing intense moisture is an ideal solution for treatment of thinning, breakage, damaged and spilt ends.*

NATURAL HAIR PRODUCTS – Pure Biology offers both shampoo and conditioner for a complete set of health and beauty products for men and women wanting thicker, fuller hair and prevent hair loss.* Safe for curly, dry and all hair types; Non-GMO; Cruelty free; Paraben free; Made in the USA.
